jp_name: らくがおペン Rakugao pen
function: The user draws over one's face on a picture via Face-Doodling Pen, and so that person's face will look exactly like it does in the photo which is doodled over by the Face-Doodling Pen. It is impossible to make the user look back normally without the usage of the Cancellation Eraser.

jp_name: 流行性ネコシャクシウイルス or 流行性ネコシャクシビールス
function:
When a few drops of Fashion Virus is put into a petri dish, the 'experimenter' can say whatever things they want to add to the present fashion an alter it in a similar way of 'invocation'. The virus will then multiply and become abundant inside the petri dish. Afterwards, spreading the virus in the air will then make the virus spread and 'infects' any of the 'victims'. After the victim has been infested, they will immediately rush to change into the new "infectious" line of fashion.
The Fashion Virus is originally used for experimentation. Since fashion always changes from about the longest of between 10 years and the shortest of between 7 months, using it helps in research of trending and grossing ideas.

jp_name: 苦手つくり機Nigatetsukuriki
function: NigatetsukurikiCreate Dekisugi's Fears, TooIf you write the person's name on the right and what you want them to be afraid of on the left, that person will be frightened by what is written. For example, if you enter Nobita's name on the right and Dorayaki on the left, he will be frightened by Dorayaki.

jp_name: 架空人物たまご
function: Once a user picks an egg and open it, a fictional character of their choice (usually one from popular culture, fairy tales or mythologies) will appear (example: Lupin or Cinderella). After summoning one, they must be given orders, and will not disappear until it is done. Each of the capsules are single use.

eng_name: Fishing Pond for Things You Dropped
jp_name: 落とし物つりぼり Ōtoshimono tsuribori
function: The pond is used for looking for things that people have dropped i.e. lost. A fishing pole is dipped in the pond a description of the lost object is given. The user then has to specify the area of where to look, and the pole will most possibly drag out the object from the pond, or at least what it thinks is the object.
appears_in: The Fishing Pond for Things You Dropped

jp_name: 虫スカン
function:
The Flashbang is one of Doraemon's gadgets.
The Flashbang causes a loud yet harmless explosion and a gust of smoke upon detonation.
appears_in: Nobita and the Knights of Dinosaurs

jp_name: ガリバー光線電灯
function: The Gulliver Beam Light has the same functions as both the Big Light and Small Light. It has two buttons: one is red and the other is blue. By pressing the red button it can enlarge humans and/or objects and the blue does the opposite, it shrinks things.
appears_in: Rats Are As Weak As Cats
Rats Are As Weak As Cats

jp_name: 生き物保護ライト
function: What creature of this light will be surrounded energies called halo protected so that people want to protect

jp_name: もどりライト Modori Raito
function: Similar to a torch, when it is pointed to some object, the object that the user points to will be transformed back to its original materials or ingredients. For example, if pointed at a dorayaki, the light will make the dorayaki transform back to ingredients like flour,red bean paste and egg.

jp_name: 復元光線 Fukugen Kōsen
function:
This gadget can be used to repair the defective goods into reusable.
The gadget can restore or do an action as Doraemon demonstrated in Doraemon Came Out! when the gadget did Nobita's homework for him. In Weakness Grasping/(Secret) Spy Operation, it was used to restore Nobita's broken vase.
appears_in: Nobita Express and the Mystery of the Train Hunter

jp_name: スモールライト Sumōru Raito
function:
The Small Light shines a light beam that can reduce the size and mass of anything or anybody it touches. 
It is a green flashlight with a yellow-orange bottom. It has a blue top with four spheres on it, and a glass hemisphere that emits the light beam. It also has two buttons, the red one shrinks the target, while the yellow one serves a reverse setting as it enlarges the target back to normal size.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future/U.S. English dub
Even Though It's Inside the Stomach Acid
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Winged Angels~
Doraemon Wii: Secret Tool King Tournament

jp_name: グレードアップライト Gurēdoappu Raito
function:
This gadget used to make things become real. For example, if the gadget beam a superhero costume, the costume will turn into a real superhero costume and have a certain ability.
The costume that have been beamed:

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetailsGeneral InformationFunctionsDetails
function:
A roller variant called the Flattening Roller is used in the 2005 anime which has the same properties as the Flattening Iron.
Use this gadget against any object (also works on people) and it will turn the object into a paper-like thinness. Since it weighs just like paper, the user can easily carry it around. It will return to normal when sprayed with water.
This gadget is used by Doraemon and Nobita to effortlessly move the furniture in Gian's cousin's apartment.

jp_name: おせじ口べに
function: The Flattering Lipstick has two sides. One side is the Flattering Lipstick itself, while the other is the Insulting Lipstick. Applying them on one's lips will make all their words either 'flattering' or 'insulting', depending on what type of lipstick used. Simply wiping them off from the lips will remove its effect.

jp_name: おだてヅヨ一ズ
function:
If someone wears the Flattery Jaws, they will be able to be very good at flattering someone.
<tabber>
|-|2005 anime=

jp_name: フワフワオビ
function: The Floating Scarf must be worn properly so that it may carry the wearer likewise. The typical method of wearing it by wrapping it around the shoulders and arm. The Floating Scarf will then make its wearer float, just like the goddess in the popular Noh play, Hagoromo. The Floating Scarf is incredibly light, so its flight pattern may be greatly affected by wind patterns. Unlike the Take-copter, the Floating Scarf doesn't consume battery.

jp_name: 飛ばし穴 Tobashi ana
function: It can skip the person or animal who set foot on it. In the manga, it became invisible when placed on the ground.

jp_name: 動物ビスケット Dōbutsu Bisuketto
function: Animal Transformation Biscuits are typically eaten by children as toys. After eating one, it requires about a few minutes to transform. During transformation, the person may involuntarily make the corresponding animal's sound like 'Growl' (for a lion), 'Meow' (for a cat) and 'Woof' (for a dog). After the transformation, the person will turn back to normal in about 5 minutes.

jp_name: インスタントチョコメーカー Insutanto Choko Mēkā
function: When an object is placed on the gadget, the gadget produces a chocolate with the shape of the certain object. The chocolate produced by the gadget is delicious.

jp_name: ポップコーン ハット
function:
This gadget turns people's anger into heat energy to cook popcorn. When someone is angry, the user can use this hat and put it on whoever is angry. The person's anger will transfer to heat and the hat will pop out popcorn, also causing the person to calm down. Different people's anger makes different flavored popcorn which depends on how often their anger is or based on their own cooking skills such as Gian. Nobita, Suneo's popcorn tastes normal, Nobita's mother's popcorn is pretty spicy, Gian's popcorn tastes like his own stew and other things he cooked, which taste awful, and Kaminari's popcorn is arguably the best popcorn tasted.
But if the wearer is angered to the limit, their anger would build up and end up producing a lot a popcorn. But unfortunately, every piece would be burnt to a crisp.
Interestingly, a different flavor is made on every alternate use in the episode Anger Popcorn.
Shizuka is the only character whose flavour is unknown.

jp_name: 味見スプーン Ajimi Supūn
function: Using the gadget, the user can taste samples of several foods from the magazines, books or pictures. It is very convenient since the user does not have to go very far or spend money just to taste the food. However, the spoon can only be used one time per picture, so if the user wants to taste it again, he/she will need another spoon.

jp_name: 声のキャンディー Koe no kyandī
function: First say anything to the mike, this will record one's voice. Then the gadget will turn it into a candy. Get another person to eat the candy and he/she will have the speaker's voice. The effect will wear off after half an hour. He/She can also change into another voice.
appears_in: I'll Become a Singer By Eating Candy

jp_name: スイカぺン Suika pen
function:
Watermelon Pen is Doraemon's gadget.
Blindfolded Shizuka is splitting watermelons.it used to make anything turn into watermelon.
appears_in: Doraemon Is An Exam Student Now!?

jp_name: イルミネーション クラッカー Iruminēshon Kurakkā
function: If someone takes this cracker, the person will glow. And once the user starts glowing, they stay lit up for the entire day.

jp_name: コンチュー丹 Konchū Tan
function:
It gives the user the power to fly like a butterfly, the power to sting like bees, ants' strength, and a strong body, such as in a hard beetle. It also causes the user to have bug-like behaviors like eating leaves, being afraid of nets and fainting due to bug sprays.
Nobita

jp_name: おそだアメ Osoda Ame
function:
When consumed, the user's voice will be delayed for a period of time, based on the amount of candy ate
Each candy can delay the user's voice for 10 minutes.

jp_name: 桃太郎印のきびだんごMomotarō Jirushi no Kibidango
function: It was used to tame a beast. Once it got rotten, it will lose its effect.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: 辞ニンジン Jininjin
function:
This gadget is used to make someone resign from his/her position.
People who resign because eating this gadget :

jp_name: しゅくテキ Shuku teki
function: If person ate it, he/she will be swelling up and overflowing with competitive spirit.
appears_in: The Mom vs. Rich Mother Battle

jp_name: ほんやくコンニャク Hon'yaku kon'nyaku
function: If one eats it, the user will be able to speak and understand other languages, has the external effect of the user sounding fluent in the other languages. This edible gadget can also be used to communicate with animals as well.
appears_in: Running Across Time! The Time Borrowing Race
Doraemon: Nobita's Legend of the Sun King
Nobita's New Great Adventure into the Underworld – The Seven Magic Users
Doraemon: Nobita's Great Battle of the Mermaid King
Doraemon: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016
Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure in the Antarctic Kachi Kochi

jp_name: ウラシマキャンディー Urashima Kyandī
function: When eaten, all acts of kindness by the user will be rewarded.
appears_in: Eight Days in the Palace of the Dragon King

jp_name: ワスレンボー Wasurenbō
function: When the gadget hits the head of a person that person's memories will be forgotten. When hit again, the memories will return but his/her memories before he/she was hit again will be removed.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: 四次元たてましブロック
function:
By inserting a "room block" between the first floor and the top floor, a new room will be created between the two floors. When looking from the outside the exterior of the house will be the same as the rooms are compressed in the 4th dimension.
The 2005 version of the anime also reveals that if the block is somehow removed while there is still a person inside the room, when exiting the room and attempting to go up or down the stairs, the person will be trapped on the same floor like Möbius strip.

jp_name: 友だちの輪 Tomodachi no Wa
function: By standing inside the circle with a partner it can make them befriend each other.

jp_name: ケガワリング Kegawaringu
function: When the body passes through this hoop, it will be coated with fur. The effect of Fur Coat Ring does not wear off until three days. The fur can be shaved, but it grows back after some time.
